name: market for cadmium sludge from zinc electrolysis | cadmium sludge from zinc electrolysis | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/1703/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for 'cadmium sludge from zinc electrolysis', in the Global geography. This is a constrained market for consequential system model, for attributional system models, this is a regular market. In the case of consequential system model, details about the marginal consumer can be found in the comment of the conditional exchange (by-product).;This product is generally considered to be used at the production site.  Therefore, the market does not contain any transport.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'cadmium sludge from zinc electrolysis',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of  cadmium sludge from zinc electrolysis', to the consumers of this product. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
